# condensedAbbreviated

**Type Property**

Uses the abbreviated form but condensed if possible. For example, “2hr 10min”, “2小時10分鐘”

## Declaration

```swift
static var condensedAbbreviated: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style { get }
```
